attributes.action: hold a Public Inquiry into the Contaminated blood and a considerable sum of compensation and an apology.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the biggest scandal in the history of the NHS,we the victims have been forgotten and left to die in abject poverty. Our lives and that of our families has been devastated.We call on the Government to be open and transparent, as they committed themselves when elected.
